languages.text: "Яд — лишь средство. Собственные пороки обрекут врага на смерть".
"Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."
languages.original_text: "Яд — лишь средство. Собственные пороки обрекут врага на смерть".

traits.locale_text: "Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."

languages.text: "Gift ist nur ein Werkzeug. Der Feind wird Opfer seiner eigenen Laster."
languages.original_text: "Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."

traits.locale_text: "Gift ist nur ein Werkzeug. "Der Feind wird Opfer seiner eigenen Laster."

languages.text: « Le poison n'est guère qu'un instrument. Ce sont ses propres vices qui scelleront la perte de l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."

traits.locale_text: « Le poison n'est guère qu'un instrument. Ce sont ses propres vices qui scelleront la perte de l'ennemi. »

languages.text: «El veneno es solo una herramienta. La condena del enemigo será obra de sus propios vicios».
languages.original_text: "Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."

traits.locale_text: «El veneno es solo una herramienta. La condena del enemigo será obra de sus propios vicios».

languages.text: 「毒はただの道具だ。敵は己の悪徳によって断罪されるの」
languages.original_text: "Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."

traits.locale_text: 「毒はただの道具だ。敵は己の悪徳によって断罪されるの」

languages.text: “毒药仅仅是工具而已。敌人之所以难逃一死，是因为他们犯下的邪恶罪行。”
languages.original_text: "Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."

traits.locale_text: “毒药仅仅是工具而已。敌人之所以难逃一死，是因为他们犯下的邪恶罪行。”

languages.text: "Zehir sadece araçtır. Düşman, kendi özürlerinin sonuçlarına katlanacak."
languages.original_text: "Poison is but a tool. The enemy will be condemned by their own vices."
